EmailTemplate.name: 18-Aviation-AviationDG-Email-ATM2019 TY-T003RV.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {{my.EmailSubjectLine}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=customer}}, Thank you for visiting the Nokia stand at World ATM Congress 2019, March 12-14, in Madrid, Spain. We hope that the information and demonstrations we shared gave you deep insights into how, together and through innovations and upgrade strategies, we can meet our ANSP challenges and capture the full benefits that IP and LTE network environments can bring for the future of our industry. If you would like to get in touch with us, visit our page <[[https://networks.nokia.com/industries/aviation?did=d000000001ie&utm_campaign=aviationdg&utm_source=email-list-atm-ty&utm_medium=email&utm_content=event&utm_term=attendees]]> and select get in touch with a Nokia aviation expert. You will be directed to a member of our team for follow up. Again, it was great to be part of such a great event with you and we look forward to the bright future for aviation ahead! With thanks, The Nokia aviation team Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
